workwithtrees

Class TreeMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • workwithtrees.TreeMenu

  • class TreeMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    The class of the Menu for work with Binary Tree. Object is created and launched by method run() of the MenuMain. An one menu entry added into array of entries by anonymous class, which implements an abstract class MenuEntry.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    DantalioNxxi
    See Also:
    MenuMain, BinaryTree, MenuEntry

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<MenuEntry> entries
      An array of the entries for the TreeMenu
      private boolean isExit
      If true, then running of the menu will be stoped
